What's your new role about?

Revenue Analyst




    Do you want to be part of DAZN’s ever growing advertising division?
   



    At DAZN our Revenue Analyst will help manage and analyse all data relevant to the performance of commercial advertising on DAZN, including impressions, revenue systems, viewership and audience behavior.
   



    At DAZN we have a changing environment, therefore, your role and responsibilities vary, one day you could be looking at how well we are monetising our key rights, and the next could be making a business case for new product initiatives including our own inventory forecasting and planning tool. You will have the opportunity to track and deliver insight into the performance of the media division. With a strong commercial mindset, your data presentation and statistical analysis will help dictate ad strategy and KPI’s, whilst providing the division the ability to access and understand the data themselves.
   



    You will act as our business owner, working with the larger data and technology teams to define requirements and deliverables to derive meaningful analysis. You may be looking at the advertising and revenue pipelines or working with our Data Scientists to look at forecasting models.
   



    You will work with DAZN markets globally, understanding the differences in broadcast and advertising practices, and being able to tailor data-based suggestions accordingly.
   



    This is a great opportunity to join a high growth division.
   


As our new Revenue Analyst, you’ll have the opportunity to:




Explore all data relevant to the performance of commercial advertising on DAZN, including impressions, revenue, viewership, and audience behavior.
Monitor and own data quality of our internal CRM (Dynamics 365) and inventory management systems.
Deliver and share reports on a regular and ad-hoc basis, manipulating data across various and changing metrics and dimensions.
Build dashboards to support the analysis and reporting of data on a weekly/monthly basis.
Manage data-dependent projects and new processes, from capturing requirements, design, and implementation – in the name of improving data quality.
Be an expert in all metrics and trends related to advertising and be able to identify insights to explain such trends.
Explore new initiatives in relation to maximising advertising revenue opportunities through data evaluation, including audience enrichment, new ad concepts, and current delivery refinements.
Work closely with Advertising Technology Team, supporting the role out of new initiatives and ad formats.


You’ll be set up for success if you have:


    Proven experience in evaluation of big data and familiarity with statistical data analysis and visualization tools such as Looker/PowerBi/Tableau
   

    Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel
   

    Both efficient time-management, task prioritization and strong communication skills – ability to communicate and translate information into actions to senior management.
   

Experienced in data querying using SQL.


    An understanding of the sales cycle within Advertising
   



 Even better if you have:




Ability to work in a fast-paced and enthusiastic environment.
Experienced in both broadcast and advertising (particularly sport)
Experienced in data modelling, particularly focused on revenue models.
Working Knowledge of programming knowledge such as Python
Knowledge of Microsoft Dynamics 365 or similar
Experience in querying APIs from third parties
